body:
Fixes #6331 

```spack buildcache list``` has the following new flags:
``` bash
--show-flags          show spec compiler flags
--show-full-compiler  show full compiler specs
-v, --variants        show variants in output (can be long)
```

Output
``` bash
# spack buildcache list apr-util
==> Finding buildcaches in <MIRROR>/build_cache
==> buildcache spec(s) matching 'apr-util'
-- linux-centos7-x86_64 / gcc@4.8.5 -----------------------------
ev3wtha apr-util@1.6.0

# spack buildcache list -v apr-util
==> Finding buildcaches in <MIRROR>/build_cache
==> buildcache spec(s) matching 'apr-util'
-- linux-centos7-x86_64 / gcc@4.8.5 -----------------------------
ev3wtha apr-util@1.6.0+crypto~gdbm~odbc~pgsql~sqlite
```
title: Changed 'buildcache list' to more closely resemble 'spack find'
